This is just a flatout bad conversion. Don't waste your time and dowload. It stutters in my Samsung C5500 as well. It also won't play/stutters on my PC and two other laptops including one with dedicated 1Gb of graphics. I used VLC and KMPlayer. Download from elsewhere! Stop seeding this shit!! :}

The quality is impeccable. Interlaced 1920x1080 @ 29.970 HZ + DTS-HD MA lossless sounds.

If it stutters, it is because your wreck of a computer can't handle the quality. Either your computer is too slow or you don't know how to configure it. In either case, you are a n00b.
Imho bad conversion to 29.970 fps.vhiiska do not understand that duplicated frames that cause stutter is visible also viewing frames step by step. is not a cpu issue or bad refresh rate setting.
